title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: **Dockerfile optimization**: Split into granular stages (`prod_deps`, `all_deps`, `warmup_cache`, `precompute_stage`) for better caching and parallelization
**Premium request docs**: Added explicit UTC timestamp (00:00:00) for monthly counter reset
**Build process**: Async fetching of translation repos with error handling
**Production image**: Separated dev/prod dependencies, streamlined artifact copying

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- **Dockerfile optimization**: Split into granular stages (`prod_deps`, `all_deps`, `warmup_cache`, `precompute_stage`) for better caching and parallelization
- **Premium request docs**: Added explicit UTC timestamp (00:00:00) for monthly counter reset
- **Build process**: Async fetching of translation repos with error handling
- **Production image**: Separated dev/prod dependencies, streamlined artifact copying

### Title
Optimize Docker build stages, clarify premium request reset time, and improve translation fetching
